sentences.en: An automatic tracing centric wavelength demodulation system based on the edge filter which can measure the wavelength of the narrow-band back-reflected spectrum FBG is described.

sentences.en: As to environmental issue arises the debate between human centric theory and non - humanistic theory.
sentences.cn: 针对环境问题产生了人类中心主义与非人类中心主义的争论.

sentences.en: Better User centric settings control for the GUI. Things like splash screen toggle, etc.
sentences.cn: 更好的以用户为中心的GUI设置控制.如启动画面的转换等.

sentences.en: Enzymes play an important part in the process of centric split.
sentences.cn: 酶在着丝粒分裂过程中起着重要作用.

sentences.en: He portrays the psyche as poly-centric.
sentences.cn: 在他的描绘中精神是多中心的。

sentences.en: In 2013, the company began to expand the software R & D team, for various industries, to expand the RFID technology centric industry solutions.

sentences.cn: 研究美军网络中心战的发展情况,是时代对我们的客观要求.

sentences.en: Java itself isn't guaranteed to become the development platform of choice in this emerging network - centric world.
sentences.cn: Java本身不能保证成为新兴的网络为中心计算世界中的候选开发平台.

sentences.en: Network centric design and manufacturing is a rising product development mode that has expansive foreground.
sentences.cn: 网络化设计与制造是一种新兴的产品开发方式,具有广阔的前景.

sentences.en: OpenID is an open, decentralized, free framework for user - centric digital identity.
sentences.cn: 开放ID是开放的, 分散的, 以用户中心数字识别的自由框架.

sentences.en: Our customer - centric to product quality as the basis, strategies and problem - solving oriented.

sentences.en: That culture was characterized by fear, intimidation, favoritism, a very ego-centric CEO.
sentences.cn: 之前那种文化的特征是：敬畏、威胁、徇私，还有一位以自我为中心的首席执行官。

sentences.en: The target is to guide the web - centric reengineering works.
sentences.cn: 以期对面向Web的再工程有一定指导意义.

sentences.en: The troubling thing is that all of the definitions are IT - centric.
sentences.cn: 令人不安的是,所有的定义是IT为中心的.

sentences.en: Theo - centric world view and value system.
sentences.cn: 以神为中心的世界观与价值观.

sentences.en: Unit testing is an important part of an overall testing - centric development strategy.

sentences.en: We are customer - centric, very process driven, and enthusiastic about China Manufacturing.
sentences.cn: 我们以客户为中心, 非常进程驱动, 而热衷于中国制造业.
